0.6.name: wordpress/wpsc-inventory-manager
0.6.description:
This Plugin is for the Shopping Cart Plugin to manage the product stock. Currently it works only for the wp-e-commerce plugin version 3.7.8 or lower and products with limited quantity (physically on stock)

Features:

* Two tables "Out of Stock" and "In Stock"
* Tables searchable and limitable to your search phrase
* For every product clickable link to product page

Plugin's Official Site

WPSC-Inventory-Manager Official Site (Inventory Manager official site)

Translations

  • currently none
